## Problem 1

### Numerical Discussion
```{r}
data("penguins", package = "palmerpenguins")
summary(penguins)
nrow(penguins)
ncol(penguins)
```
The dataset "penguins" shows the basic statistics of three penguins species. The "penguins" is a 344 \times 8 dataset. The mean flipper length is 200.9mm except two NA values.
